mapper.select: select * from tbl_qna order by pos desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna(num, title, content, writer, cnum, pos) values(seq_qna.nextVal, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{cnum}, seq_qna.nextVal)
insert into tbl_qna(num, title, content, writer, cnum, pos, depth) values(seq_qna.nextVal, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{cnum}, #{pos}, #{depth})
mapper.update: update tbl_qna set pos=pos+1 where pos>=#{pos}
mapper.select: select q.*, c.ctitle from tbl_qna q, tbl_class c where q.cnum=c.cnum and q.num=#{num}
mapper.update: update tbl_qna set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where num=#{num}
